NOTES: Lot classifications: A = public water AND sewer available; B = public water OR sewer available; C = on-site water AND sewer.
This district is established for all development located within 1,000 feet of the high water level of Lake Memphremagog.

This district acts as overlay Not affecting use for development except requiring further review for adherence to the form based code set forth in the bylaws. The criteria for review are 1. Regulating Map; 2. Building Envelope Standards; 3. Streetscape Standards.
